item.title: By: Andre
item.dc:creator: Andre
item.description: <p>Hi Matt, <br />can you please email me the specs of your old laptop? I need a laptop for my mum and it might well do (after it is fixed). And please let me know how much you would want for it... Thanks André</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hi Matt,
can you please email me the specs of your old laptop? I need a laptop for my mum and it might well do (after it is fixed). And please let me know how much you would want for it… Thanks André
